Package org.springframework.boot.http.client

@NullMarked package org.springframework.boot.http.client
Client-side HTTP support classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.springframework.boot.http.client.autoconfigure
    Auto-configuration for client-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.boot.http.client.reactive
    Client-side reactive HTTP support classes.
  • Class
    Description
    ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder<T extends ClientHttpRequestFactory>
    Interface used to build a fully configured ClientHttpRequestFactory.
    HttpClientSettings
    Settings that can be applied when creating an imperative or reactive HTTP client.
    HttpComponentsClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder
    Builder for ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.httpComponents().
    HttpComponentsHttpAsyncClientBuilder
    Builder that can be used to create a Apache HttpComponents HttpAsyncClient.
    HttpComponentsHttpClientBuilder
    Builder that can be used to create a Apache HttpComponents HttpClient.
    HttpComponentsHttpClientBuilder.TlsSocketStrategyFactory
    Factory that can be used to optionally create a TlsSocketStrategy given an SslBundle.
    HttpRedirects
    Redirect strategies support by HTTP clients.
    JdkClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder
    Builder for ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.jdk().
    JdkHttpClientBuilder
    Builder that can be used to create a JDK HttpClient.
    JettyClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder
    Builder for ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.jetty().
    JettyHttpClientBuilder
    Builder that can be used to create a Jetty HttpClient.
    ReactorClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder
    Builder for ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.reactor().
    ReactorHttpClientBuilder
    Builder that can be used to create a Rector Netty HttpClient.
    SimpleClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder
    Builder for ClientHttpRequestFactoryBuilder.simple().
